play literally any other game of this buildtypegenre and it will hammer home how perfectly this game was made  there is a reason it is the gold standard of genredefining game that it is  every run unlocks something new and doesnt punish the player with more tedium for the sake of hours invested looking at you roguegenesia and slormancer  buy this and ignore every other roguelike on steam   no seriously unless its named angband this game relegates it to pointlessness
